summary: The module defines two AWS CDK stack constructs that provision serverless compute resources. One stack creates a Lambda function placed inside a VPC with the required networking and IAM configuration. The second stack sets up a Lambda function that handles SAML authentication, including its supporting infrastructure such as IAM roles and any SAM integration needed for the test environment.
business_intent: Provide reusable infrastructure-as-code definitions for integration tests that validate Lambda deployment within a VPC and Lambda-based SAML authentication workflows using AWS CDK.
